News.Title: Neelam Linens and Garments: Strong NSE SME Debut with 66.87% Premium
News.Summary: Neelam Linens and Garments shares listed at ₹40.05 on NSE SME, a 66.87% premium over the IPO price of ₹24. The ₹13 crore IPO was oversubscribed 91.97 times, with strong demand across investor categories. The company plans to use the proceeds for capital expenditure, debt repayment, and general corporate purposes.
